name: Jump Coders
description:
In JumpCoders You are a Hacker trying to surpass the complex firewall of some important company. To do that your little line of code (aka C.U.B.E.) will go across layers and layers, with complex buildings and platforms. but C.U.B.E. has a special ability: he can modify the value of JUMP to make different cases: jump more, activate switches, acces locked doors... and a lot more! But you can modify only 2 times the JUMP value, so think!  

Made By Eric Sanchez, Xavier Ribas and Javier Maldonado.

Made for a JanduJam on November 2018, a special class that in 12 hours divided in 2 days we need to make a game, and also is a grade for the subject.
